data.message: The picture is called the dog tag, military men & women wear this identification around their necks. We loss so many soldiers,  I can't say happy veterans day. I will saluted the men & women before & now who fought for us & who is still fighting today.

replies.message: Lost....is the past tense not loss
Larry Claffy , i understood what she meant just fine .
Larry Claffy stupid post. understand what is said,  Not a spelling lesson . Idiot
Larry Claffy, get a grip and don’t be so petty😡

I love all the wonderful people that take time from their intellectual lives to bless us with their vast knowledge of the English language. Thank you sir! I had no idea what was being communicated here until you chimed in and saved the day! Larry, you are truly a great American Hero!
You might be thinking of Memorial Day.
Memorial Day is to remember the servicemembers lost in military service.  Veterans Day is to honor living veterans.  It is *Happy*.
Happy is right. Thank you veterans for your services
ขอขอบคุณค่ะ

HAPPY FOR THE ONE'S THAT STILL DOING THIS HARD JOB THAT ONLY THE BRAVES WILL DO., THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SERVICES., AND FROM THE BOTTON OF MY HEART R.I.P FOR THE ONE'S THAT DID NOT MADE IT BACK.  MAY THE LORD BLESS THEM ALL.,
Guess most of you don’t know why there are two dog tags.  CO keeps one.  One goes with body.  Now they break in half.  A name tag is also put in each boot.  Contains the DNA data number.
